column4: How would I be able to return from Cairo-Dock to using Unity, please?
I miss my icons down the left
I am trying to recover my system after (rashly) having begun removing perl.
I now have Cairo-Dock on my screen but I want to return to Unity, I think.
I would think you could just echo "/usr/bin/lightdm" > /etc/X11/default-display-manager
